rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a foyer area for initial welcome.
An open-plan living area connected to the kitchen. Designed in Bohemian style with vibrant colors and eclectic decor, following Vastu principles by ensuring a clear line of sight from the entrance.
An area for dining that complements the living space. Adjoins the kitchen with open access and natural ventilation as per Vastu norms.
Open-plan kitchen integrated with the dining area. Equipped with modern amenities while retaining a Bohemian charm through handcrafted fixtures and warm color palettes.
A quiet reading nook/library situated near the living area. Designed with sound insulation and soft lighting to create a serene atmosphere in accordance with Vastu principles.
Primary bathroom on the ground floor for guests, ensuring proper ventilation and natural light entry as recommended by local building codes.

openings.description: A robust door with a modern glass insert to welcome residents.
Large windows ensuring ample natural light in the living area, enhancing visual appeal and energy flow according to Vastu principles.
A sliding door connecting the kitchen with the dining and living areas, facilitating an open-plan layout.
Sized windows to provide natural light while maintaining privacy for the library area.
